description: This beef couscous is quite savoury with simple ingredients.
name: Ground Beef Pearl Couscous Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small white onion, peeled and diced
1 medium red capsicum, de-seeded and finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: Place the couscous and 400ml of the beef stock in a pot and bring to the boil, allow to simmer for 25 minutes.
Heat up a pan to a medium heat the canola oil and fry the beef for 8 minutes while turning.
Add the onion, pepper and garlic to the pan and fry for a further 4 minutes.
Once the pearl couscous is cooked, remove from the heat and allow to cool slightly.
Combine the couscous with the rest of the ingredients before serving with rocket and parmesan as garnish.
